mapper.select: SELECT seq as licensesSeq, name as licensesName FROM licenses

SELECT ul.email,u.name, ul.licenses_seq, l.name ,ul.reg_dt FROM User_Licenses ul JOIN licenses l ON ul.licenses_seq = l.seq JOIN users u ON u.email = ul.email WHERE ul.licenses_seq = #{licensesSeq} AND u.email = #{email}

SELECT ul.email, ul.licenses_seq, l.name AS licensesName, DATE_FORMAT(ul.reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') AS reg_dt FROM User_Licenses ul JOIN Licenses l ON ul.licenses_seq = l.seq JOIN Users u ON u.email = ul.email WHERE u.email = #{email}
